content.html: I hate reading other people's code. Mine is so clean and well structured. Everything is commented neatly and laid out logically. This thing I'm dealing with is a mess. Cryptically named functions, irrelevant comments, multiple styles. Who is this "© Terence Eden 2019" guy anyway?
content.value:
I hate reading other people's code.
Mine is so clean and well structured. Everything is commented neatly and laid out logically.
This thing I'm dealing with is a mess. Cryptically named functions, irrelevant comments, multiple styles.
Who is this "© Terence Eden 2019" guy anyway?
